entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to drizzle before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 30 December 2022
